name: King Cat
description:
King Cat is a  3-4 player, local multiplayer party game. You will play as one of four cats fighting for dominance of a suburban household. Your goal is to get the crown and keep it away from your enemies, using attacks like swiping, dashing, and spitting up hairball traps. If you successfully hold the crown long enough to fill up your king meter for two separate rounds you will be deemed king cat.

Controllers tested with

Xbox One (Windows and Mac*)

Xbox 360 (Windows and Mac*)

PS4 (Windows*** and Mac)

PS3 (Windows** and Mac)

*requires driver and Xbox One only works wired on Mac

https://github.com/360Controller/360Controller

**requires driver

https://motioninjoyofficial.org

***wired only, bluetooth not supported

For full list of supported controllers go to:

http://www.gallantgames.com/pages/incontrol-supported-controllers

If you are experiencing issues with your controller go to:

http://www.gallantgames.com/pages/incontrol-known-issues
